page.title: 05INDUSTRY ALONG THE CART
page.content: There is only{one industrial estate} in the area.It is located in the valley of the White Cart Water.It is an{old estate}which dates back to the days when water powered the textile industry.The last mill closed in 1900. Some old mill buildings have been{ renovated.On the west bank there is a {renovated mill}called Lower Mill which is occupied by an accountants office and a plumber.There is a builders yard and a roofing contractor on this site. The White Cart estate on the east bank contains a Steel Stockyard, a timber yard,a car repairer and scrapyard,a shoe factory and offices. As the industrial estate was built before Busby became a suburb the {houses}and{factories}are close together.The most recently built houses can only be reached via the entrance of the industrial estate.
